mapper.select: /* playnote.com.dao.IMemberdDao.loginChk */ SELECT MAX(A.LOGIN_CHK) AS loginChk ,MAX(A.EMAIL_CHK) AS emailChk FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN 0 < COUNT(1) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS LOGIN_CHK ,NULL AS EMAIL_CHK FROM MEMBER WHERE 1 = 1 AND EMAIL = #{EMAIL} AND PASSWORD = #{PASSWORD} UNION SELECT NULL AS LOGIN_CHK ,CASE WHEN 0 < COUNT(1) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS EMAIL_CHK FROM MEMBER WHERE 1 = 1 AND EMAIL = #{EMAIL} ) A
